attributes.action: fridge frezzer and microwave law to all sleeper cabs. so tramper drivers can eat healthy while way all week and look after there  long term health.
attributes.additional_details: A e-petition to try and make law that all sleeper cabs have  a fitted  fridge/frezzer and microwave. So the long distance tramper driver can eat more healthy and look after his long term health if he wishes to do so at a more affordable price. The services in the uk dont supplie great  food and as my facebook page the trucking chef has proved over the last 12 months there is a great deal of drivers who would like to eat more healthy. So i would like to see a law passed where all tramping/ sleeper cabs have proper cooking facilitys provied.
